FuncDef:
The igmp snooping learning disable command disables an interface from dynamically learning forwarding entries.
The undo igmp snooping learning disable command enables an interface to dynamically learn forwarding entries. The igmp snooping learning disable command disables an interface from dynamically learning forwarding entries. The undo igmp snooping learning disable command enables an interface to dynamically learn forwarding entries. By default, an interface is enabled to dynamically learn forwarding entries. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: 100GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,200GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,400GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,50GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,Eth-Trunk Layer 2 sub-interface view,Layer 2 sub-interface view
